short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches tweet information based on the URL in the active tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever Wanted to Comment on Any Website?
Now you can! With Comment The Web, it's possible to leave comments on any webpage you visit. This free and user-friendly Chrome extension makes it easy to share your thoughts and engage with content across the web. Install it today and start commenting everywhere!
